tossup_question: 1) PHYSICS  A model rocket has a mass of 0.5 kg. The upward thrust on the rocket is 20 N. Calculate the resultant force on the rocket. Assume gravity = 10m/s^2.
bonus_question: 1) PHYSICS  The mass of this rocket is 0·5 kg. Use your answer to TOSS UP and recall an equation to calculate the acceleration of the model rocket
